title: Cloudwatch Dashoard for Lambda
description: Patterns creates a Lambda Function and Cloudwatch Dashoard with Metrics from Lambda

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to deploy Lambda with the necessary tools that helps in enabling ability to send metrics to Cloudwatch Dashboard.
Dashboard leverage metrics from Default Namespace, LambdaInsight, and Custom metrics from Lambda.
Lambda Docker Image has the Insight Agent part of the Lambda and use Lambda Powertools to send the Custom Metrics.
See the Github repo for detailed deployment instructions.
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
See the Github repo for detailed cleanup instructions.
